00034 // TCLAP : Templatized C++ Command Line Parser includes
00035 #include <tclap/CmdLine.h>

00037 // STL includes
00038 #include "string"
00039 #include "iostream"

00041 // VTK includes
00042 #include "vtkSmartPointer.h"
00043 #include "vtkPolyData.h"
00044 #include "vtkAppendPolyData.h"
00045 #include "vtkPolyDataWriter.h"
00046 
00047 // Local includes
00048 #include "btkTypes.h"
00049 #include "btkPoint.h"
00050 #include "btkDirection.h"
00051 #include "btkSignal.h"
00052 #include "btkSignalExtractor.h"
00053 #include "btkSHModel.h"
00054 #include "btkSHModelEstimator.h"
00055 #include "btkImportanceDensity.h"
00056 #include "btkAPrioriDensity.h"
00057 #include "btkLikelihoodDensity.h"
00058 #include "btkParticleFilter.h"
00059 #include "btkNiftiFilenameRadix.h"

00062 using namespace btk;

00065 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00066 {
00067     // Command line variables
00068     std::string dwiFileName;
00069     std::string vecFileName;
00070     std::string maskFileName;
00071     std::string labelFilename;
00072     std::vector<int> select_labels;
00073 
00074     std::string outMapFileName;
00075     std::string outFibersFileName;
00076 
00077     bool verboseMode;
00078     bool quietMode;
00079     bool saveTmpFiles;
00080     bool lps;
00081 
00082     unsigned int modelOrder;
00083     Real lambda;
00084     unsigned int nbOfParticles;
00085     Real stepSize;
00086     Real epsilon;
00087     Real Kappa;
00088     Real angleThreshold;
00089     Float seedSpacing;
00090 
00091     std::string inRadix;
00092 
00093 
00094     try
00095     {
00096         //
00097         // Program's command line parser definition
00098         //
00099 
00100             // Defines command line parser
00101             TCLAP::CmdLine cmd("BTK Tractography", ' ', "0.2");
00102 
00103             // Defines arguments
00104             TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string>   dwiArg("d", "dwi", "Dwi sequence", true, "", "string", cmd);
00105             TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string>  maskArg("m", "mask", "White matter mask", true, "", "string", cmd);
00106             TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> labelArg("l", "label", "Label volume of seeds", true, "", "string", cmd);
00107             TCLAP::MultiArg<int>        labelsArg("", "labels", "Label select for processing", false, "int", cmd);
00108 
00109             TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string>    outMapArg("", "map", "Output connection map filename (default \"map-label\")", false, "map", "string", cmd);
00110             TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> outFibersArg("", "fibers", "Output fibers filename (default \"fibers-label\")", false, "fibers", "string", cmd);
00111 
00112             TCLAP::SwitchArg verboseSwitchArg("", "verbose", "Display more informations on standard output", cmd, false);
00113             TCLAP::SwitchArg quietSwitchArg("", "quiet", "Display no information on either standard and error outputs", cmd, false);
00114             TCLAP::SwitchArg saveTmpSwitchArg("", "save_temporary_files", "Save diffusion signal, model coefficients, variance and spherical coordinates of gradient directions in files", cmd, false);
00115             TCLAP::SwitchArg lpsSwitchArg("", "lps", "Word coordinates expressed in LPS (Left-Posterior-Superior). By default RAS (Right-Anterior-Superior) is used.", cmd, false);
00116 
00117             TCLAP::ValueArg<unsigned int> orderArg("", "model_order", "Order of the model (i.e. of spherical harmonics) (default 4)", false, 4, "unsigned int", cmd);
00118             TCLAP::ValueArg<Real>    lambdArg("", "model_regularization", "Regularization coefficient of the model (default 0.006)", false, 0.006, "Real", cmd);
00119             TCLAP::ValueArg<unsigned int> particlesArg("", "number_of_particles", "Number of particles (default 1000)", false, 1000, "unsigned int", cmd);
00120             TCLAP::ValueArg<Real>    epsilonArg("", "resampling_threshold", "Resampling treshold (default 0.01)", false, 0.01, "Real", cmd);
00121             TCLAP::ValueArg<Real>    stepSizeArg("", "step_size", "Step size of particles displacement (default 0.5)", false, 0.5, "Real", cmd);
00122             TCLAP::ValueArg<Real>    KappaArg("", "curve_constraint", "Curve constraint of a particle's trajectory (default 30)", false, 30.0, "Real", cmd);
00123             TCLAP::ValueArg<Real>    angleThreshArg("", "angular_threshold", "Angular threshold between successive displacement vector of a particle's trajectory (default PI/3)", false, M_PI/3., "Real", cmd);
00124             TCLAP::ValueArg<Real>    seedSpacingArg("", "seed_spacing", "Spacing in mm between seeds (default 1)", false, 1.0, "float", cmd);
00125 
00126             // Parsing arguments
00127             cmd.parse(argc, argv);
00128 
00129             // Get back arguments' values
00130             dwiFileName    = dwiArg.getValue();
00131             maskFileName   = maskArg.getValue();
00132             labelFilename  = labelArg.getValue();
00133             select_labels  = labelsArg.getValue();
00134 
00135             outMapFileName    = outMapArg.getValue();
00136             outFibersFileName = outFibersArg.getValue();
00137 
00138             verboseMode  = verboseSwitchArg.getValue();
00139             quietMode    = quietSwitchArg.getValue();
00140             saveTmpFiles = saveTmpSwitchArg.getValue();
00141             lps          = lpsSwitchArg.getValue();
00142 
00143             modelOrder     = orderArg.getValue();
00144             lambda         = lambdArg.getValue();
00145             nbOfParticles  = particlesArg.getValue();
00146             epsilon        = epsilonArg.getValue();
00147             stepSize       = stepSizeArg.getValue();
00148             Kappa          = KappaArg.getValue();
00149             angleThreshold = angleThreshArg.getValue();
00150             seedSpacing    = seedSpacingArg.getValue();
00151 
00152 
00153             inRadix     = GetRadixOf(dwiFileName);
00154             vecFileName = inRadix + ".bvec";
00155     }
00156     catch(TCLAP::ArgException &e)
00157     {
00158         std::cout << "TCLAP error: " << e.error() << " for argument " << e.argId() << std::endl;
00159         std::exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00160     }
00161 
00162 
00163     char displayMode = quietMode ? 0 : (verboseMode ? 2 : 1);
00164 
00165 
00166     //
00167     // Diffusion signal extraction
00168     //
00169 
00170         SignalExtractor *extractor = new SignalExtractor(vecFileName, dwiFileName, maskFileName, displayMode);
00171         extractor->extract();
00172 
00173         std::vector<Direction> *directions = extractor->GetDirections();
00174         Sequence::Pointer       signal     = extractor->GetSignal();
00175         std::vector<Real>      *sigmas     = extractor->GetSigmas();
00176         Mask::Pointer           mask       = extractor->GetMask();
00177 
00178         if(saveTmpFiles)
00179             extractor->save();
00180 
00181         delete extractor;
00182 
00183 
00184     //
00185     // Model estimation
00186     //
00187 
00188         SHModelEstimator *estimator = new SHModelEstimator(signal, directions, mask, modelOrder, lambda, displayMode);
00189         estimator->estimate();
00190 
00191         Sequence::Pointer model = estimator->GetModel();
00192 
00193         if(saveTmpFiles)
00194             estimator->save();
00195 
00196         delete estimator;
00197 
00198 
00199 
00200 
00201     //
00202     // Tractography (using particles filter)
00203     //
00204 
00205 
00206         // Get spherical harmonics model
00207         SHModel *modelFun = new SHModel(model, directions, displayMode);
00208 
00209         // Get signal
00210         Signal *signalFun = new Signal(signal, sigmas, directions, displayMode);
00211 
00212         // Read label image if any and verify sizes
00213         LabelMapReader::Pointer labelReader = LabelMapReader::New();
00214         labelReader->SetFileName(labelFilename);
00215         labelReader->Update();
00216         LabelMap::Pointer labelVolume = labelReader->GetOutput();
00217 
00218 
00219         // Initialize output structures
00220         std::vector<int> labels;
00221         std::vector<vtkSmartPointer<vtkAppendPolyData> > fibers;
00222         std::vector<Image::Pointer> connectMaps;
00223 
00224 
00225         // Resample label map
00226         LabelResampler::Pointer labelResampler = LabelResampler::New();
00227         labelResampler->SetInput(labelVolume);
00228 
00229         LabelInterpolator::Pointer labelInterpolator = LabelInterpolator::New();
00230         labelResampler->SetInterpolator(labelInterpolator);
00231 
00232         LabelMap::SpacingType spacing = labelVolume->GetSpacing();
00233         LabelMap::SizeType size = labelVolume->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize();
00234         size[0] *= spacing[0]/seedSpacing; size[1] *= spacing[1]/seedSpacing; size[2] *= spacing[2]/seedSpacing;
00235         labelResampler->SetSize(size);
00236 
00237         LabelMap::DirectionType direction = labelVolume->GetDirection();
00238         labelResampler->SetOutputDirection(direction);
00239 
00240         LabelMap::PointType origin = labelVolume->GetOrigin();
00241         labelResampler->SetOutputOrigin(origin);
00242 
00243         spacing[0] = seedSpacing; spacing[1] = seedSpacing; spacing[2] = seedSpacing;
00244         labelResampler->SetOutputSpacing(spacing);
00245 
00246         labelResampler->Update();
00247         LabelMap::Pointer resampledLabelVolume = labelResampler->GetOutput();
00248 
00249         // Apply filter on each labeled voxels
00250         LabelMapIterator labelIt(resampledLabelVolume, resampledLabelVolume->GetLargestPossibleRegion());
00251 
00252         unsigned int numOfSeeds = 0;
00253 
00254         for(labelIt.GoToBegin(); !labelIt.IsAtEnd(); ++labelIt)
00255         {
00256             if(labelIt.Get() > 0 &&
00257                (select_labels.size() == 0 ||
00258                 *std::find(select_labels.begin(),select_labels.end(),labelIt.Get()) == labelIt.Get()) )
00259                 numOfSeeds++;
00260         }
00261 
00262         unsigned int numOfSeedsDone = 0;
00263 
00264         std::cout << std::fixed;
00265         std::cout << std::setprecision(2);
00266         Display1(displayMode, std::cout << "Running tractography..." << std::endl);
00267         for(labelIt.GoToBegin(); !labelIt.IsAtEnd(); ++labelIt)
00268         {
00269             int label = (int)labelIt.Get();
00270 
00271             if(label > 0 &&
00272                (select_labels.size() == 0 ||
00273                 *std::find(select_labels.begin(),select_labels.end(),label) == label) )
00274             {
00275                 LabelMap::IndexType index = labelIt.GetIndex();
00276 
00277                 itk::Point<Real,3> worldPoint;
00278                 resampledLabelVolume->TransformIndexToPhysicalPoint(index, worldPoint);
00279 
00280                 Mask::IndexType maskIndex;
00281                 mask->TransformPhysicalPointToIndex(worldPoint, maskIndex);
00282 
00283                 // If the seed is not in the mask, there is no need to continue this one
00284                 if(mask->GetPixel(maskIndex) != 0)
00285                 {
00286                     Point begin(worldPoint[0], worldPoint[1], worldPoint[2]);
00287 
00288                     // Set up filter's densities
00289                     ImportanceDensity importance(signalFun, modelFun, angleThreshold);
00290                     APrioriDensity    apriori(Kappa);
00291                     LikelihoodDensity likelihood(signalFun, modelFun);
00292 
00293 
00294                     // Let's start filtering
00295                     Display1(displayMode, std::cout << "\tProgress: " << (Real)numOfSeedsDone / (Real)numOfSeeds * 100 << "%\r" << std::flush);
00296                     Display2(displayMode, std::cout << "Filtering label " << label << "..." << std::endl);
00297                     Display2(displayMode, std::cout << "\tSeed's world coordinates: (" << worldPoint[0] << "," << worldPoint[1] << "," << worldPoint[2] << ")" << std::endl);
00298                     Display2(displayMode, std::cout << "\tSeed's image coordinates: (" << maskIndex[0] << "," << maskIndex[1] << "," << maskIndex[2] << ")" << std::endl);
00299 
00300                     ParticleFilter filter(signalFun, modelFun, apriori, likelihood, importance, mask, signalFun->getSize(), signalFun->getOrigin(), signalFun->getSpacing(), nbOfParticles, begin, epsilon, stepSize, displayMode);
00301 
00302                     if(lps)
00303                         filter.SetLPSOn();
00304 
00305                     filter.run(label);
00306 
00307 
00308                     // Save data
00309 
00310                     assert(fibers.size() == connectMaps.size());
00311 
00312                     for(int l=labels.size(); l<label; l++)
00313                         labels.push_back(-1);
00314 
00315                     if(labels[label-1] == -1)
00316                     {
00317                         fibers.push_back(vtkSmartPointer<vtkAppendPolyData>::New());
00318 
00319                         connectMaps.push_back(Image::New());
00320                         connectMaps.back()->SetOrigin(signalFun->getOrigin());
00321                         connectMaps.back()->SetSpacing(signalFun->getSpacing());
00322                         connectMaps.back()->SetRegions(signalFun->getSize());
00323                         connectMaps.back()->SetDirection(modelFun->GetDirection());
00324                         connectMaps.back()->Allocate();
00325                         connectMaps.back()->FillBuffer(0);
00326 
00327                         labels[label-1] = fibers.size()-1;
00328                     }
00329 
00330 
00331                     fibers[labels[label-1]]->AddInput(filter.GetFiber());
00332 
00333                     ImageIterator out(connectMaps[labels[label-1]], connectMaps[labels[label-1]]->GetLargestPossibleRegion());
00334                     ImageIterator  in(filter.GetConnectionMap(), filter.GetConnectionMap()->GetLargestPossibleRegion());
00335 
00336                     for(in.GoToBegin(), out.GoToBegin(); !in.IsAtEnd() && !out.IsAtEnd(); ++in, ++out)
00337                         out.Set(out.Get() + in.Get());
00338 
00339                     Display2(displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00340 
00341                     numOfSeedsDone++;
00342                 }
00343             }
00344         } // for each labeled voxels
00345         Display1(displayMode, std::cout << "\tProgress: 100.00%" << std::endl << "done." << std::endl);
00346 
00347         delete signalFun;
00348         delete modelFun;
00349         delete directions;
00350         delete sigmas;
00351 
00352 
00353     //
00354     // Writing files
00355     //
00356 
00357         Display1(displayMode, std::cout << "Writing results..." << std::endl);
00358 
00359         // Normalize and write connection map image
00360         Display2(displayMode, std::cout << "\tWriting connectivity maps..." << std::flush);
00361         for(unsigned int label = 0; label < labels.size(); label++)
00362         {
00363             if(labels[label] != -1)
00364             {
00365                 Real max = 0;
00366                 ImageIterator it(connectMaps[labels[label]], connectMaps[labels[label]]->GetLargestPossibleRegion());
00367 
00368                 for(it.GoToBegin(); !it.IsAtEnd(); ++it)
00369                 {
00370                     if(max < it.Get())
00371                         max = it.Get();
00372                 }
00373 
00374                 if(max > 0)
00375                 {
00376                     for(it.GoToBegin(); !it.IsAtEnd(); ++it)
00377                         it.Set(it.Get() / max);
00378                 }
00379 
00380                 try
00381                 {
00382                     std::stringstream filename;
00383                     filename << outMapFileName << "-" << label+1 << ".nii.gz";
00384 
00385                     ImageWriter::Pointer writer = ImageWriter::New();
00386                     writer->SetFileName(filename.str().c_str());
00387                     writer->SetInput(connectMaps[labels[label]]);
00388                     writer->Update();
00389                 }
00390                 catch(itk::ImageFileWriterException &err)
00391                 {
00392                     std::cout << "Error: " << std::endl;
00393                     std::cout << err << std::endl;
00394                 }
00395             }
00396         }
00397         Display2(displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00398 
00399         // Write fiber polydata
00400         Display2(displayMode, std::cout << "\tWriting fibers..." << std::flush);
00401         for(unsigned int label = 0; label < labels.size(); label++)
00402         {
00403             if(labels[label] != -1)
00404             {
00405                 unsigned int nbOfInputs = fibers[labels[label]]->GetNumberOfInputPorts();
00406                 bool saveFibers = true;
00407                 unsigned int i = 0;
00408 
00409                 do
00410                 {
00411                     if(fibers[labels[label]]->GetNumberOfInputConnections(i++) < 1)
00412                         saveFibers = false;
00413                 } while(saveFibers && i<nbOfInputs);
00414 
00415                 if(saveFibers)
00416                 {
00417                     std::stringstream filename;
00418                     filename << outFibersFileName << "-" << label+1 << ".vtk";
00419 
00420                     fibers[labels[label]]->Update();
00421                     vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyDataWriter> writer = vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyDataWriter>::New();
00422                     writer->SetInput(fibers[labels[label]]->GetOutput());
00423                     writer->SetFileName(filename.str().c_str());
00424                     writer->Write();
00425                 }
00426             }
00427         }
00428         Display2(displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00429 
00430     Display1(displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00431 
00432 
00433     return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00434 }
